K12n221u_001:2: evaṃ mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān śuddhāvāsopari-gaganatala-pratiṣṭhite sapta-ratna pravibha kta-vicitra-ratna-vyūhe mahā-maṇḍalamāḍe viharati sma ||
K12n221u_001:4: tatra khalu bhagavān bodhisa[t]tvān āmantrayate sma ||
K12n221u_001:5: udgṛhṇīdhavaṃ yūyaṃ kulaputrā imāṃ ṣaṇmukhī-nāma-dhāraṇīṃ sarva-jagad-dhitārthaṃ ||
K12n221u_001:7: saṃsāre saṃsarato yo me kaścid duḥkhā nubhavaḥ sa mā bhūt sa rva samatā'pratisaṃvidita- lakṣa ṇaḥ | [2]
K12n221u_001:8: yaś ca me kaścil laukika-sampatti-sukhānubhavaḥ sa bhavatu sarva-sa[t]tva-sādhāraṇa-pa ribhogaḥ | [3]
K12n221u_001:9: yac ca me kiñcit pāpa-karm[ā]kuśala-mūlaṃ karmāvaraṇaṃ tan mā bhūd
K12n221u_001:11: yāni ca me māra-karmāṇi tāni mā bhūvann aparijñātāny anuttarayā parijñayā |[5]
K12n221u_001:12: yac ca me kiñcit pāramitopasaṃhi taṃ kuśala-mūlaṃ laukika-lokottaraṃ vā tad bhavatu sarva-sa[t]tvānām anuttara-jñānaṃ | [6]
K12n221u_001:13: yā ca me vimuktiḥ sā bhavatu sarva-sa[t]tva-vimokṣāya |
K12n221u_001:14: mā ca me bhūt saṃsāre nirvāṇe prati-ṣṭhitatā ||
K12n221u_001:37: yaḥ kaścit kulapu tro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ ṣaṇmukhī-nāma-dhāraṇīṃ triṣ-kṛtvā rātres triṣ-kṛtvā divasya cānuvar (t)
K12n221u_001:40: ||idam avoc d bha gavān ātta-manās te ca bodhisa[t]tvā mahāsa[t]tvā bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandann iti ||
